Name: Escape!
About the game: Travel back in time and enjoy the retro feel of a 2D adventure game. Wind your way through labyrinths filled with ghosts, spiders, goblins and other surprises before you run out of light! Collect as much treasure as you can along the way in order to receive bonus power ups to help you. 50% of proceeds from this game will go to benefit CHOC Children's.
